text: Ryan Seacrest has done pretty well guest co - hosting the syndicated “ Live ” with Kelly Ripa. And soon we ’ ll see how the duo performs on a permanent basis. In five episodes as a fill - in, the “ American Idol ” alum has averaged a 2. 56 Nielsen TV rating. That ’ s good enough to rank him 20th among the many ( 67, to be exact ) whom “ Live With Kelly ” tried out over the past 12 months. Below are a few folks who have done even better than the guy who ’ d like to forget his time on Fox ’ s “ Knock Knock Live. ” Also Read : Kelly Ripa Names Ryan Seacrest as Her New'Live'Co - Host ( Video ) Rank : 19 Co - Host : Anderson Cooper No. of Episodes
